TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegistryAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class RegistryAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: 表示一组允许或拒绝用户或组进行访问的权限。

span.span: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一组.NET Framework 提供了用于管理 Windows 上的注册表项的访问控制安全性的类之一。The class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on registry keys. 有关这些类和它们与基础 Windows 访问控制结构的关系的概述，请参阅。For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see . > [!NOTE] > Windows 访问控制安全性只能应用到注册表项。Windows access control security can only be applied to registry keys. 它不能应用于单个键/值对存储在的密钥。It cannot be applied to individual key/value pairs stored in a key. 若要获取当前应用于注册表项的规则的列表，请使用方法以获取对象，以及如何将其方法来获取一系列对象。To get a list of the rules currently applied to a registry key, use the method to get a object, and then use its method to obtain a collection of objects. 对象不会映射一对一的基础的自由控制访问列表 (DACL) 中的访问控制项。 objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary control access list (DACL). 在注册表项获得的所有访问规则集，集合将包含的最小数量的当前表示的访问控制项所需要的规则。When you get the set of all access rules for a registry key, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries. > [!NOTE] > 基础的访问控制项更改，在应用和删除规则。The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules. 如果可能，合并中规则的信息保持最少数量的访问控制项。The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries. 因此，当读取规则的当前列表，它可能不完全一样已添加的所有规则的列表。Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added. 使用对象来指定要允许或拒绝对用户或组访问权限。Use objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group. 一个对象始终表示允许访问还是拒绝访问，但永远不会同时。A object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both. 若要将规则应用于注册表项，请使用方法以获取对象。To apply a rule to a registry key, use the method to get the object. 修改对象使用其方法来添加规则，以及如何将方法重新附加的安全对象。Modify the object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the method to reattach the security object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 对所做的更改对象并不会影响注册表项的访问级别，直到你调用方法以将修改过的安全对象分配到注册表项。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the registry key until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the registry key. 对象是不可变。 objects are immutable. 使用的方法修改注册表项安全性类来添加或删除规则; 执行此操作时，修改基础的访问控制项。Security for a registry key is modified using the methods of the class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用继承和传播访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此示例将创建对象，然后创建并添加了具有两个规则标志。The example creates a object, then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一条规则有任何传播标志，而第二个和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序显示中的规则对象，并使用该对象创建一个子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建子项和孙级子项，，然后显示每个子项的安全性。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the security for each subkey. 最后，程序会删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数指定默认传播和继承。This constructor specifies default propagation and inheritance. 即和。That is, and . 此构造函数相当于创建对象，通过传递`identity`到构造函数，并传递新建对象传递给构造函数。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建注册表访问规则，并将它们添加到合并对象，其中显示如何允许和拒绝权限的规则都保持独立，而兼容的相同规则类型。The following code example creates registry access rules and adds them to a object, showing how rules that allow and deny rights remain separate, while compatible rules of the same kind are merged. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistrySecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定此规则应用到的用户或组、访问权限、传播标志以及是否允许或拒绝指定的访问权限。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the user or group the rule applies to, the access rights, the inheritance flags, the propagation flags, and whether the specified access rights are allowed or denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器，因此对注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志，则忽略传播标志，并仅即时项会受到影响。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果存在此标志，则规则会传播下表中所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 表假定子项 S 具有子项 CS 和孙级子项 GS。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说，三级子项的路径是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 三级子项的模式控制所包含的三级子项的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果对于指定标志`inheritanceFlags`并传播标志为指定`propagationFlags`，此规则不适用于直接子项，但不适用于所有直接子子项和所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标记为可`inheritanceFlags`，没有在此过程中点。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 用于访问控制的目的，在一个子项的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的访问权限会受该子项的权限。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项的容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地复杂化维护的规则，因为它会影响否则为兼容规则组合起来。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules.

exception.span: 既不属于类型 ，也不属于可以转换为 类型的类型（如 ）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有注册表项都是容器，因此对注册表项有意义的唯一继承标志是标志。All registry keys are containers, so the only inheritance flag that is meaningful for registry keys is the flag. 如果未指定此标志，则忽略传播标志，并仅即时项会受到影响。If this flag is not specified, the propagation flags are ignored, and only the immediate key is affected. 如果存在此标志，则规则会传播下表中所示。If the flag is present, the rule is propagated as shown in the following table. 表假定子项 S 具有子项 CS 和孙级子项 GS。The table assumes there is a subkey S with child subkey CS and grandchild subkey GS. 也就是说，三级子项的路径是 S\CS\GS。That is, the path for the grandchild subkey is S\CS\GS. |传播标志Propagation flags|SS|CSCS|GSGS| |-----------------------|-------|--------|--------| ||XX|XX|XX| ||XX|XX|| |||XX|XX| |, , ||XX|| 三级子项的模式控制所包含的三级子项的所有子项。The pattern for the grandchild subkey governs all subkeys contained by the grandchild subkey. 例如，如果对于指定标志`inheritanceFlags`并传播标志为指定`propagationFlags`，此规则不适用于直接子项，但不适用于所有直接子子项和所有子项它们包含。For example, if the flag is specified for `inheritanceFlags` and the propagation flag is specified for `propagationFlags`, this rule does not apply to the immediate subkey, but does apply to all its immediate child subkeys and to all subkeys they contain. > [!NOTE] > 虽然可以指定标记为可`inheritanceFlags`，没有在此过程中点。Although you can specify the flag for `inheritanceFlags`, there is no point in doing so. 用于访问控制的目的，在一个子项的名称/值对不是单独的对象。For the purposes of access control, the name/value pairs in a subkey are not separate objects. 名称/值对的访问权限会受该子项的权限。The access rights to name/value pairs are controlled by the rights of the subkey. 此外，由于所有子项的容器 （即，它们可以包含其他子项），它们不受标志。Furthermore, since all subkeys are containers (that is, they can contain other subkeys), they are not affected by the flag. 最后，指定标志不必要地复杂化维护的规则，因为它会影响否则为兼容规则组合起来。Finally, specifying the flag needlessly complicates the maintenance of rules, because it interferes with the combination of otherwise compatible rules. 此构造函数相当于创建对象，通过传递`identity`到构造函数，并传递新建对象传递给构造函数。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用继承和传播访问规则。The following code example demonstrates access rules with inheritance and propagation. 此示例将创建对象，然后创建并添加了具有两个规则标志。The example creates a object, and then creates and adds two rules that have the flag. 第一条规则有任何传播标志，而第二个和。The first rule has no propagation flags, while the second has and . 该程序显示中的规则对象，然后使用对象来创建一个子项。The program displays the rules in the object, and then uses the object to create a subkey. 该程序创建子项和孙级子项，，然后显示每个子项的规则。The program creates a child subkey and a grandchild subkey, and then displays the rules for each subkey. 最后，程序会删除测试密钥。Finally, the program deletes the test keys. [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.RegistryAccessRule.ctor2/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RegistryRights As RegistryRights

summary.span: 获取访问规则允许或拒绝的权限。

span.span: Gets the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

value.span: 值的按位组合，它指示访问规则允许或拒绝的权限。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values indicating the rights allowed or denied by the access rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象是不可变。 objects are immutable. 可以创建新的访问规则表示不同的用户、 不同的权限，或者其他，但不能修改现有的访问规则。You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different , but you cannot modify an existing access rule.
